entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
